Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
main.java.com.team.game.controller.LoginController
public class LoginController extends Object
Controller for the Login screen.

Handles user authentication and registration, validating input and delegating logic to GameService. On success, passes the logged-in user to a callback so the next view can be loaded.

    • setDependencies

      public void setDependencies(GameService svc, Consumer<User> onSuccess)
      Injects dependencies for authentication logic.
      Parameters:
      svc - the game service instance
      onSuccess - callback invoked on successful login

    • checkUser

      public Optional<User> checkUser(String username, char[] password)
      Checks login credentials and returns an Optional containing the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      username - the username entered
      password - the password entered
      Returns:
      Optional<User> if credentials are valid, otherwise Optional.empty()

    • registerUser

      public User registerUser(String username, char[] password)
      Registers a new user.
      Parameters:
      username - desired username
      password - chosen password
      Returns:
      the created User
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if username already exists
